name: subspecialty

a subject that someone knows a lot about, within a larger subject, particularly in medicine: The study of infectious diseases is a subspecialty of internal medicine. Salaries vary greatly, depending on experience and sub-specialty.
More examplesFewer examplesIt's important for scientists and economists to learn about more than just their subspecialties. Some subspecialties of surgery, such as neurosurgery, involve long hours.It's one of the most popular subspecialties in medicine.
